text: you can grow over 160 different crops on an aeroponic Tower vertical farming with aeroponics allows you to grow without the use of soil not only do you save 95 water compared to soil based farming but you can also save 90 space aeroponic crops are bursting with nutrients featuring up to 35 more nutrient density than soil based plants
